mean_cn: adj. 国事的，团体事务的，实际的，注重实效的
mean_en: dealing with the problems that exist in a specific situation in a reasonable and logical way instead of depending on ideas and theories
word_etyma: pragm行为+atic...的→以行为最重要的→pragmatic注重实效的
short_phrase: Pragmatic people only care about what works.
sentence: He is a very pragmatic man, always focusing on what specifically to do next.
sentence_trans: 他是个很注重实效的人，永远都专注在每件接下来要完成的事情上。
